    publications

    Cloud overlapping parameter obtained from CloudSat/CALIPSO dataset and its application in AGCM with McICA scheme

    Published in Atmospheric Research, 2016

    About parameterizing cloud overlap using satellite-detected cloud profiles.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Hua Zhang, Jie Peng, Jiangnan Li, Howard W. Barker. 2016. "Cloud overlapping parameter obtained from CloudSat/CALIPSO dataset and its application in AGCM with McICA scheme". Atmospheric Research 170, 52-65. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.atmosres.2015.11.007

    Advances in studies of cloud overlap and its radiative transfer in climate models

    Published in Journal of Meteorological Research, 2016

    A review about advances in cloud overlap parameterization in GCMs.

    Citation: Zhang, Hua, Xianwen Jing. 2016. "Advances in Studies on Cloud Overlap and Its Radiative Transfer in Climate Models". Journal of Meteorological Research 30, 156-168. https://doi.org/10.1007/s13351-016-5164-5

    A Multimodel Study on Warm Precipitation Biases in Global Models Compared to Satellite Observations

    Published in Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 2017

    About multi-model warm rain process comparison.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Kentaroh Suzuki, Huan Guo, Daisuke Goto, Tomoo Ogura, Tsuyoshi Koshiro, Johannes Mülmenstädt. 2017. "A multimodel study on warm precipitation biases in global models compared to satellite observations". Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres 122, 11,806–11,824. https://doi.org/10.1002/2017JD027310

    Improving Representation of Tropical Cloud Overlap in GCMs Based on Cloud-Resolving Model Data

    Published in Journal of Meteorological Research, 2018

    About parameterization of cloud overlap for tropical areas in GCMs.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Hua Zhang, Masaki Satoh, and Shuyun Zhao. 2018. "Improving Representation of Tropical Cloud Overlap in GCMs Based on Cloud-Resolving Model Data". Journal of Meteorological Research 32, 233–245. https://doi.org/10.1007/s13351-018-7095-9

    The Impact of Process-Based Warm Rain Constraints on the Aerosol Indirect Effect

    Published in Geophysical Research Letters, 2018

    About a method for process-based warm rain constraints.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Kentaroh Suzuki. 2018. "The impact of process-based warm rain constraints on the aerosol indirect effect". Geophysical Research Letters 45, 10,729–10,737. https://doi.org/10.1029/2018GL079956

    The Key Role of Warm Rain Parameterization in Determining the Aerosol Indirect Effect in a Global Climate Model

    Published in Journal of Climate, 2019

    About the importance of warm rain parameterization in GCMs.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Kentaroh Suzuki, and Takuro Michibata. 2019. "The key role of warm rain parameterization in determining the aerosol indirect effect in a global climate model". Journal of Climate 32, 14: 4409-4430. https://doi.org/10.1175/JCLI-D-18-0789.1

    Direct Influence of Solar Spectral Irradiance on the High-Latitude Surface Climate

    Published in Journal of Climate, 2021

    About impact of solar spectrum biases on polar climate simulations.

    Citation: Jing, Xianwen, Xianglei Huang, Xiuhong Chen, Dong L. Wu, Peter Pilewskie, Odele Coddington, and Erik Richard. 2021. "Direct Influence of Solar Spectral Irradiance on the High-Latitude Surface Climate", Journal of Climate 34, 10 (2021): 4145-4158. https://doi.org/10.1175/JCLI-D-20-0743.1

    Impact of a New Radiation Scheme on Simulated Climate in the Global–Regional Integrated SysTem Model under Varying Physical Parameterization Schemes

    Published in Atmosphere, 2024

    About testing BCC-RAD radiation scheme in GRIST.

    Citation: Yuan, Chang, Hua Zhang, Xianwen Jing, Shuyun Zhao, and Xiaohan Li. 2024. "Impact of a New Radiation Scheme on Simulated Climate in the Global–Regional Integrated SysTem Model under Varying Physical Parameterization Schemes". Atmosphere 15, no. 4: 501. https://doi.org/10.3390/atmos15040501

    Domain adaptation method for extracting buildings from remote sensing images using dual contrastive learning

    Published in Journal of Applied Remote Sensing, 2024

    About deeplearning-based building identification method from satellite images.

    Citation: He, Chunxiu, Xianwen Jing. 2024. "Domain adaptation method for extracting buildings from remote sensing images using dual contrastive learning". J. Appl. Rem. Sens. 18(3), 034517. https://doi.org/10.1117/1.JRS.18.034517

    Implications of Spaceborne High-resolution Solar Spectral Irradiance Observation for the Assessment of Surface Solar Energy in China

    Published in Energies, 2025

    About impact of observed solar spectrum on estimated surface solar energy.

    Citation: Kong, Chenxi, Xianwen Jing, Xiaorui Niu, and Jing Jing. 2025. "Implications of Spaceborne High-resolution Solar Spectral Irradiance Observation for the Assessment of Surface Solar Energy in China". Energies 18(5): 1221. https://doi.org/10.3390/en18051221

    Observed solar spectrum significantly affects polar climate projection.

    Aerosol-cloud-precipitation interaction modelling

    Physical parameterization of Cloud vertical overlap

    Associating cloud overlap with its dynamic environment improves radiation in GCMs.
